professionalism: In a world where customer service is dwindling, I find it even more important to step up and deliver an experience that proves to my clients that I'm willing to listen and put in the time required to get the desired results. I believe this is equally important in every stage of a project from concept to capturing to editing and finally to delivery.
passion: I love being an aerial photography drone pilot. It allows me to take photography and video in a way that was impossible or prohibitively expensive in the past. I find every instance I can to get time in the air, taking great video and photos. I hope that one of those instances is for you with however large or small your project is.
